name: Team King - SiegeKnight
description:
Battle through a castle to challenge the king of diamonds in this hack and slash top down game! Elements are randomised on each level, providing you with a different outcome each battle!

Will you conquer the Diamond King?

----

This project was created as part of a second year university brief at the University of South Wales, in association with Tiny Rebel Games. BA Computer Games Design and BA Game Art students were given the module brief... "When is a Card Game NOT a Card Game?". Teams were asked to make an 8 to 10 minute experience.

This module has been recognised for its excellence with a Grads in Games 2022 Award for Collaborative Initiative.
